data.actual_result: Presssing the Save Changes button results in no change being made or error being shown. The save changes button remains in the same location.
data.expected_result: The server name should change/An error message should pop up saying that you can't make a server name with a space
data.short_description: Trying to save a server name with leading spaces results in no change made or error being given
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server overview - Change the server name to something that has a space as its first character - Save changes
